ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to view files in raw binary form like in a hex editor.  Additional functions to specify and read arbitrary binary formats.
Functions to view files in raw binary form like in a hex editor.  Additional functions to specify and read arbitrary binary formats.

name: r-hexview
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3-4' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-hexview
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/hexView_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/hexView/hexView_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cccdedb26a5f926f82ddc1945703198a8a406f02efd3c9e4d18a34bda2c71106

build:
  number: 5
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('hexView')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('hexView')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=hexView
  license: GPL-2.0-only
  summary: Functions to view files in raw binary form like in a hex editor.  Additional functions
    to specify and read arbitrary binary formats.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: hexView
# Version: 0.3-4
# Title: Viewing Binary Files
# Authors@R: c(person("Paul", "Murrell", role = c("aut", "cre"), email = "paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz"), person("Chao", "Bian", role = "ctb"))
# Depends: R (>= 1.8.0)
# Description: Functions to view files in raw binary form like in a hex editor.  Additional functions to specify and read arbitrary binary formats.
# License: GPL-2
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2019-03-13 01:16:15 UTC; pmur002
# Author: Paul Murrell [aut, cre], Chao Bian [ctb]
# Maintainer: Paul Murrell <paul@stat.auckland.ac.nz>
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2019-03-13 06:20:15 UTC
